title: Display problem
body: After the recent patch I tried playing a game and all was well until I noticed I could not load into the boards before the game started. I was able to select a champion and everything and the people I was playing with said I was loaded but I only saw a black screen. I reinstalled along with using hextech repair but nothing is working. I still get a black screen and a frozen computer. =[

replies.body: The black screen you see is usually due to a network issue that's having trouble establishing a connection to the game server.  Check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up for good.  Let me know if you still have issues afterwards!
